titlestmt.titleproper: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, Program Files, RG 5
A Guide to the John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, Program Files, RG 5 FA1820

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 18:24:41 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, Program Files, RG 5

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Knight Foundation has title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection. Permission to publish extensive excerpts, or material in its entirety, will be referred to the Knight Foundation.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records ten years old or older are open for research.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in subgroups by record type. Subgroups are often further subdivided in series primarily by program or subject.
